2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
:Arwen appears in Rivendell after the Council of Elrond. She has a brief dialogue with Aragorn
column2: and recites several lines from the The Riddle of Strider. No voice actress is specified
column3: but it is likely Kath Soucie.

column1: 2001-03: The Lord of the Rings (film series):
:Arwen is played by Liv Tyler. Various additional scenes pertaining to Arwen are inserted
column2: some of which deviate from the books and some of which seem inspired by The Tale of Aragorn and Arwen.
she rescues Frodo Baggins from the Nazgûl at Bruinen
column3: thwarting them with a sudden flood
column4: summoned by an incantation. In the book
column5: it was Glorfindel who put Frodo on horseback and sent him alone to flee the Black Riders
column6: and Elrond and Gandalf arranged the flood. Also
column8: Frodo defends himself against the Black Riders
column9: whereas in the movie Arwen defends him.  Arwen wields the sword Hadhafang

column1: :There are  scene in which Aragorn has a dream about Arwen in which they kiss

column2: towards the end of the cinematic trilogy she apparently becomes sick with grief possibly over Aragorns seemingly hopeless cause and his impending death. Elrond takes the reforged Narsil
column5: and tells him that her fate has become bound with the One Ring
column6: and that she is dying. However

column1: 2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:

:Arwen is a non-playable character and can be found in a gazebo overlooking the path from Rivendell into the Misty Mountains. She was not involved in the main storyline - or any side-quests for that matter - until 2010
column2: when she passed Halbarad the banner she had made for Aragorn during the Epic Book Oath of the Rangers.
